title: Are Rakan and Xayah in the Loot system yet?
body: Can we get confirmation or an announcement when Rakan and Xayah are in the loot system?  I'd like to reroll some champion shards and try to get them, but I want to make sure not to do so until they've been added to the list... I saw somewhere in a FAQ they may take like a day to be added and it's been 2 days, but wasn't sure if that "day" is really accurate or not...

replies.body: Yeah, they should be available for unlock through hextach crafting.  We usually ask to wait at least a day before trying because they don't become available right away, as you mentioned.  Give it a go to, but keep in mind you still have Sejuani locked so it's possible that you'll unlock her.  I'm offended on behalf of our poro riding hero.  :P
